name: EAGLE BRAND® Peanut Butter Fudge
author: Eagle brand
summary: The family will go wild for this peanutty fudge. Peanut butter, chopped peanuts, and white chocolate really make it special.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
½ cup Jif® Creamy Peanut Butter
2 (6 ounce) packages white chocolate squares or white baking bars, chopped
directions: In heavy saucepan, heat sweetened condensed milk and peanut butter over medium heat until just bubbly, stirring constantly
Stir in white chocolate until smooth
Immediately stir in peanuts and vanilla
Spread evenly into wax paper lined 8-or 9-inch square pan
Cover and chill 2 hours or until firm
Turn fudge onto cutting board; peel off paper
Sprinkle with additional chopped peanuts if desired
